019
020import net.kyori.adventure.text.Component;
021import net.tnemc.core.TNECore;
022import net.tnemc.core.account.Account;
023import net.tnemc.core.account.PlayerAccount;
024import net.tnemc.core.account.holdings.modify.HoldingsModifier;
025import net.tnemc.core.currency.Currency;
026import net.tnemc.core.manager.TransactionManager;
027import net.tnemc.core.menu.icons.actions.PageSwitchWithClose;
028import net.tnemc.core.transaction.Receipt;
029import net.tnemc.item.providers.SkullProfile;
030import net.tnemc.menu.core.builder.IconBuilder;
031import net.tnemc.menu.core.callbacks.page.PageOpenCallback;
032import net.tnemc.menu.core.viewer.MenuViewer;
033import net.tnemc.plugincore.PluginCore;
034
035import java.util.Collections;
036import java.util.Date;
037import java.util.Optional;
038import java.util.UUID;
039
040/**
041 * TransactionInfoPage
042 *
043 * @author creatorfromhell
044 * @since 0.1.2.0
045 */
046public class TransactionInfoPage {
047
048  private final String returnMenu;
049  private final int returnPage;
050  private final String transactionID;
051
052  public TransactionInfoPage(final String returnMenu, final int returnPage, final String transactionID) {
053
054    this.returnMenu = returnMenu;
055    this.returnPage = returnPage;
056    this.transactionID = transactionID;
057  }
058
059  public void handle(final PageOpenCallback callback) {
060
061    final Optional<MenuViewer> viewer = callback.getPlayer().viewer();
062    if(viewer.isPresent()) {
063
064      callback.getPage().addIcon(new IconBuilder(PluginCore.server().stackBuilder().of("BARRIER", 1)
065                                                         .customName(Component.text("Escape Menu"))
066                                                         .lore(Collections.singletonList(Component.text("Click to exit this menu."))))
067                                         .withActions(new PageSwitchWithClose(returnMenu, returnPage))
068                                         .withSlot(0)
069                                         .build());
070
071      final Optional<Object> transactionObj = viewer.get().findData(transactionID);
072      if(transactionObj.isEmpty()) {
073        return;
074      }
075
076      try {
077
078        final UUID id = UUID.fromString((String)transactionObj.get());
079        final Optional<Receipt> receipt = TransactionManager.receipts().getReceiptByUUID(id);
080        if(receipt.isPresent()) {
081
082          callback.getPage().addIcon(new IconBuilder(PluginCore.server().stackBuilder().of("CLOCK", 1)
083                                                             .customName(Component.text(TNECore.eco().transaction().getFormat().format(new Date(receipt.get().getTime()))))
084                                                             .lore(Collections.singletonList(Component.text("Time of Transaction"))))
085                                             .withSlot(2)
086                                             .build());
087
088          callback.getPage().addIcon(new IconBuilder(PluginCore.server().stackBuilder().of("NAME_TAG", 1)
089                                                             .customName(Component.text(id.toString()))
090                                                             .lore(Collections.singletonList(Component.text("UUID of Transaction"))))
091                                             .withSlot(4)
092                                             .build());
093
094          callback.getPage().addIcon(new IconBuilder(PluginCore.server().stackBuilder().of("PAPER", 1)
095                                                             .customName(Component.text(receipt.get().getType()))
096                                                             .lore(Collections.singletonList(Component.text("Type of Transaction"))))
097                                             .withSlot(6)
098                                             .build());
099
100          final String source = (receipt.get().getSource() != null)? receipt.get().getSource().asString() : "No Source Logged";
101          callback.getPage().addIcon(new IconBuilder(PluginCore.server().stackBuilder().of("PAPER", 1)
102                                                             .customName(Component.text(source))
103                                                             .lore(Collections.singletonList(Component.text("Source of Transaction"))))
104                                             .withSlot(8)
105                                             .build());
106
107          if(receipt.get().getModifierTo() != null && receipt.get().getTo() != null) {
108
109            final HoldingsModifier modifier = receipt.get().getModifierTo();
110            final Optional<Account> to = receipt.get().getTo().asAccount();
111
112            final String name = (to.isPresent())? to.get().getName() : "No Name";
113            SkullProfile profile = null;
114            try {
115
116              if(to.isPresent() && to.get() instanceof final PlayerAccount playerAccount) {
117                profile = new SkullProfile();
118
119                if(PluginCore.server().playedBefore(playerAccount.getUUID())) {
120                  profile.uuid(playerAccount.getUUID());
121                }
122              }
123
124            } catch(final Exception ignore) { }
125
126            callback.getPage().addIcon(new IconBuilder(PluginCore.server().stackBuilder().of("PLAYER_HEAD", 1)
127                                                               .profile(profile)
128                                                               .customName(Component.text(name))
129                                                               .lore(Collections.singletonList(Component.text("To Account"))))
130                                               .withSlot(24)
131                                               .build());
132
133            final Currency cur = TNECore.eco().currency().findOrDefault(modifier.getCurrency());
134            callback.getPage().addIcon(new IconBuilder(PluginCore.server().stackBuilder().of(cur.getIconMaterial(), 1)
135                                                               .customName(Component.text(cur.getIdentifier()))
136                                                               .lore(Collections.singletonList(Component.text("Modifier Currency"))))
137                                               .withSlot(27)
138                                               .build());
139
140            callback.getPage().addIcon(new IconBuilder(PluginCore.server().stackBuilder().of("MAP", 1)
141                                                               .customName(Component.text(modifier.getRegion()))
142                                                               .lore(Collections.singletonList(Component.text("Modifier Region"))))
143                                               .withSlot(28)
144                                               .build());
145
146            callback.getPage().addIcon(new IconBuilder(PluginCore.server().stackBuilder().of("GOLD_INGOT", 1)
147                                                               .customName(Component.text(modifier.getModifier().toPlainString()))
148                                                               .lore(Collections.singletonList(Component.text("Modifier Amount"))))
149                                               .withSlot(29)
150                                               .build());
151
152            callback.getPage().addIcon(new IconBuilder(PluginCore.server().stackBuilder().of("REDSTONE_TORCH", 1)
153                                                               .customName(Component.text(modifier.getOperation().name()))
154                                                               .lore(Collections.singletonList(Component.text("Modifier Operation"))))
155                                               .withSlot(30)
156                                               .build());
157          }
158
159          if(receipt.get().getModifierFrom() != null && receipt.get().getFrom() != null) {
160
161            final HoldingsModifier modifier = receipt.get().getModifierFrom();
162            final Optional<Account> from = receipt.get().getFrom().asAccount();
163
164            final String name = (from.isPresent())? from.get().getName() : "No Name";
165            SkullProfile profile = null;
166            try {
167
168              if(from.isPresent() && from.get() instanceof final PlayerAccount playerAccount) {
169                profile = new SkullProfile();
170
171                if(PluginCore.server().playedBefore(playerAccount.getUUID())) {
172                  profile.uuid(playerAccount.getUUID());
173                }
174              }
175
176            } catch(final Exception ignore) { }
177
178            callback.getPage().addIcon(new IconBuilder(PluginCore.server().stackBuilder().of("PLAYER_HEAD", 1)
179                                                               .profile(profile)
180                                                               .customName(Component.text(name))
181                                                               .lore(Collections.singletonList(Component.text("From Account"))))
182                                               .withSlot(19)
183                                               .build());
184
185            final Currency cur = TNECore.eco().currency().findOrDefault(modifier.getCurrency());
186            callback.getPage().addIcon(new IconBuilder(PluginCore.server().stackBuilder().of(cur.getIconMaterial(), 1)
187                                                               .customName(Component.text(cur.getIdentifier()))
188                                                               .lore(Collections.singletonList(Component.text("Modifier Currency"))))
189                                               .withSlot(32)
190                                               .build());
191
192            callback.getPage().addIcon(new IconBuilder(PluginCore.server().stackBuilder().of("MAP", 1)
193                                                               .customName(Component.text(modifier.getRegion()))
194                                                               .lore(Collections.singletonList(Component.text("Modifier Region"))))
195                                               .withSlot(33)
196                                               .build());
197
198            callback.getPage().addIcon(new IconBuilder(PluginCore.server().stackBuilder().of("GOLD_INGOT", 1)
199                                                               .customName(Component.text(modifier.getModifier().toPlainString()))
200                                                               .lore(Collections.singletonList(Component.text("Modifier Amount"))))
201                                               .withSlot(34)
202                                               .build());
203
204            callback.getPage().addIcon(new IconBuilder(PluginCore.server().stackBuilder().of("REDSTONE_TORCH", 1)
205                                                               .customName(Component.text(modifier.getOperation().name()))
206                                                               .lore(Collections.singletonList(Component.text("Modifier Operation"))))
207                                               .withSlot(35)
208                                               .build());
209          }
210
211          //barrier icons
212          callback.getPage().addIcon(new IconBuilder(PluginCore.server().stackBuilder().of("WHITE_GLASS_PANE", 1)
213                                                             .customName(Component.text("")))
214                                             .withSlot(18).build());
215
216          callback.getPage().addIcon(new IconBuilder(PluginCore.server().stackBuilder().of("WHITE_GLASS_PANE", 1)
217                                                             .customName(Component.text("")))
218                                             .withSlot(20).build());
219
220          callback.getPage().addIcon(new IconBuilder(PluginCore.server().stackBuilder().of("WHITE_GLASS_PANE", 1)
221                                                             .customName(Component.text("")))
222                                             .withSlot(21).build());
223
224          callback.getPage().addIcon(new IconBuilder(PluginCore.server().stackBuilder().of("WHITE_GLASS_PANE", 1)
225                                                             .customName(Component.text("")))
226                                             .withSlot(22).build());
227
228          callback.getPage().addIcon(new IconBuilder(PluginCore.server().stackBuilder().of("WHITE_GLASS_PANE", 1)
229                                                             .customName(Component.text("")))
230                                             .withSlot(31).build());
231
232          callback.getPage().addIcon(new IconBuilder(PluginCore.server().stackBuilder().of("WHITE_GLASS_PANE", 1)
233                                                             .customName(Component.text("")))
234                                             .withSlot(23).build());
235
236          callback.getPage().addIcon(new IconBuilder(PluginCore.server().stackBuilder().of("WHITE_GLASS_PANE", 1)
237                                                             .customName(Component.text("")))
238                                             .withSlot(25).build());
239
240          callback.getPage().addIcon(new IconBuilder(PluginCore.server().stackBuilder().of("WHITE_GLASS_PANE", 1)
241                                                             .customName(Component.text("")))
242                                             .withSlot(26).build());
243        }
244
245      } catch(final Exception ignore) {
246      }
247    }
248  }
249}
